org.apache.hama.bsp

Class JobInProgress

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hama.bsp.JobInProgress

  • public class JobInProgress
extends Object
    JobInProgress maintains all the info for keeping a Job on the straight and narrow. It keeps its JobProfile and its latest JobStatus, plus a set of tables for doing bookkeeping of its Tasks.ss

      • completedTask

        public void completedTask(TaskInProgress tip,
                 TaskStatus status)
        Mark the completed task status. If all the tasks are completed the status of the job is updated to notify the client on the completion of the whole job.
        Parameters:
        tip - TaskInProgress object representing task.
        status - The completed task status
